actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Proboscis

actions.desc: A 10-foot radius cloud of fine powder disperses from the giant moth. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Powdery Wings (1/Day)

special_abilities.desc: The giant moth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
special_abilities.name: Antennae
